messages.content: <video>Please describe this video, mention who are the characters in it, what they did, and what is the background?

Description: There are two people in the video, one in the blue with short hair is playing the game and the other with the long hair in the grey with blue icon is explaining the game. In the game, the game character with gray hair and a cartoon-patterned backpack on their back squatted down and moved to the left. Suddenly, a blue wall appeared, blocking a thrown grenade just in time. The commentator with long hair was shocked to see this scene and almost thought the companion was about to be accidentally hit by a grenade and was frightened to death. Then, the in-game character stood up and aimed their gun at the opponent to continue shooting.
Events:
Person with short hair plays game.
Person with long hair explains game.
Game character squats down.
Game character moves left.
Blue wall appears.
Wall blocks thrown grenade.
Commentator expresses shock.
Game character stands up.
Game character aims gun.
Game character continues shooting.
<video>Please describe this video, mention who are the characters in it, what they did, and what is the background?

Description: The video starts with a group of people walking along the beach. The scene then cuts to a long-haired child donned in a black hoodie and matching hat, taking a selfie on a beach by the sea. The child is seen reaching out with the left hand, while the right hand is holding the selfie device. The video's view initially elevates, circles the child, and finally lowers offering a sweeping view of the sea, sunset, lush greenery and the beach.
Events:
People walk along the beach
Child in black hoodie takes a selfie
Child reaches out with left hand
Child holds selfie device with right hand
View elevates around the child
View circles the child
View lowers to show the sea
Sunset becomes visible
Lush greenery becomes visible
Beach comes into sweeping view
<video>Please describe this video, mention who are the characters in it, what they did, and what is the background?

Description: A bald man fires his gun ahead, the surrounding scenery quickly recedes, the camera angle switches to the front, a car sways from side to side, bullets strike the area around the car, the camera angle switches to the front of the car, inside there are two people, a brown-haired man is driving the car, and looks outside along with the other person in the car.
Events:
A bald man fires his gun ahead.
The surrounding scenery quickly recedes.
A car sways from side to side.
Bullets strike the area around the car.
A brown-haired man is driving the car.
The brown-haired man looks outside.
The other person in the car looks outside.

Description: The mechanical arm reaches into the water, attempting to retrieve glasses that emit a yellow glow. The camera cuts to a different angle from a camera, then switches back to the mechanical arm. In the water with the yellow glow, the mechanical arm crushes the goggles and slowly withdraws from the water.

The mechanical arm reaches into the water.

Description: The background is a path in a park. Two little monkeys are running forward. A person holding food appears in front of the camera. The little monkey wearing yellow clothes runs over, grabs the food with its mouth, and turns to leave. The little monkey in red clothes didn't get any and reaches out to grab the clothes of the other monkey, trying to snatch the food from its mouth. A person holding food appears again in front of the camera. They turn to face the camera. The little monkey wearing pink clothes successfully snatches the food and eats with it in its mouth, while the other monkey is eating food in front of the camera. It looks back and then the food is snatched away by another monkey beside it and eaten up.
Events:
Two little monkeys run forward on a path.
Monkey in yellow clothes grabs food with mouth.
Monkey in yellow clothes turns to leave.
Monkey in red clothes tries to snatch food.
Person holding food reappears.
Monkey in pink clothes snatches the food.
Monkey in pink clothes eats the food.
Monkey in front of camera eats food.
Monkey looks back.
Another monkey snatches and eats the food.
<video>Please describe this video, mention who are the characters in it, what they did, and what is the background?

Description: A person wearing an orange helmet and dressed in a black short-sleeve shirt rides a motorcycle towards the mountain top. The camera follows the movement; dust flies along the way. As they are about to reach the summit, the person stands up from the motorcycle, plants their feet on the ground, then turns around, swings one leg over the bike, and continues to rev the engine, with dust enveloping them. The background is a mountain.

Description: At the entrance of a room, a little boy placed a bundle of plants on the ground, then flipped up the hem of his jacket, shaking out a lot of elm seeds from his clothes. The boy then reached into his pants and pulled out more elm seeds. Following this, he shook his pant legs, and even more elm seeds fell out from there. Lastly, the boy picked up the bundle of plants that was at the doorway and set it down in front of the scattered elm seeds all over the floor. In the background, there was the sound of singing and a woman's laughter.
